pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 10, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 10, 2016:

Oshawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit General Motors and deliver remarks. A media availability will follow.

Canadian Regional Engineering Centre, North Garage
500 Wentworth Street W.
Oshawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.


Toronto, Ontario

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Women’s College Hospital Ribbon Cutting and Official Opening Ceremony.

Women’s College Hospital, Main Atrium
76 Grenville Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.


1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Ontario, Kathleen Wynne.

Women’s College Hospital, Room 2511
76 Grenville Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00p.m.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
